@graph.name: Completed Order Notifications - Customer Satisfaction Tracking - Route4Me
@graph.description: Send automated SMS notifications when orders are completed, gather customer feedback through simple surveys, and track driver performance. Improve service quality with proof of completion photos and customer ratings.
@graph.keywords: completed order notifications, customer feedback, driver ratings, delivery confirmation, customer satisfaction tracking, last-mile service quality, completion alerts, service surveys, customer experience management, field service feedback, delivery performance metrics, customer communication

@graph.name: Completed Order Notifications and Customer Feedback
@graph.description: Route4Me automatically sends SMS notifications to customers when their visit is completed, with optional proof of completion photos. Customers can then complete a simple survey rating their experience using smiley faces and optional comments. The system includes customizable surveys with business logos and branding, and provides reports to filter feedback by driver/worker, date, and rating level. This helps track service quality and customer satisfaction while maintaining transparency.
alternateName: Driver Rating and Customer Feedback System

@graph.description: Contact our team to learn how automated completion notifications and customer surveys can improve your service quality and customer satisfaction

@graph.name: Business Benefits
